resources.string: The whole changes just done will be wiped completely. Are your sure to leave this page?
Deactivate lockscreen in device admininstrator page for this device? Are you sure to deactivate?
Change the shortcut order, delete the shortcut or add shortcut
Edit Enable/Disable Home, Add More, Wifi, Shortcut Setting…
Hide Home Shortcut in the bar
Hide the setting shortcut in the bar
Hide add more shortcut in the bar
Hide Lockscreen shorcut in the bar
Activate Lockscreen in device administrators (Settings > Security > Device administrators)
DeActivate Lockscreen in device administrators (Settings > Security > Device administrators)
Hide Wifi Shortcut in the bar
Hide Auto Rotate Shortcut in the bar
Choose the indicator to be located at the left/right x center/top/bottom of view
Please feel free to send me any feedback ! Enjoy yourself !

This is an app for user to access more efficient to other application. In some case, you need to look up an unfamiliar keyword while surfing the web. You might go back to Home and press the widget/shortcut or go back to Home, press All Program list and press the application. Now you can setup the ShortcutBar once and then just press and hold the icon then slide to right to invoke the shortcut bar Finally you could access the application you want to use on the fly on your mind. 

Following the some features. 
 + Enable/Disable service on your mind 
 + Hide/Display image with/without text 
 + Modify the order of shortcut 
 + Change background opacity 
 + Hide/Display in-app setting shortcut 
 + Hide/Display Home, Add More, Lockscreen, Wifi Switcher Shortcut

+ Shortcut Icon Resize 
+ Indicator Location Relocation 
 + Confirm Dialog while leaving edit mode 
+ UI fine tune
+ Downsize the guide image to reduce the apk size
+ Lock device via shortcut!!! Now you could lockscreen without hardware key!! \n+ Fine tune UI for better user experience\n+ Fix Bugs
+ Shortcut bar at RIGHT side \n+ Update indicator icon and location to avoid app\'s action bar or tab bar\n+ Animation added

+ Support Froyo, Gingerbread os version !!!!!!
+ 'Home' shortcut added 
+ Wifi Switcher added
+ Fix bugs

+ Change background color you like 
+ Search in app selector page 
+ Setting structure reafactor : collect all enable/disable setting in new preference page
+ Performance tune up
+ Add Ads\n+ Drag list in re-order page for better user experience \n+ Search app with ignore case sensitive
+ Fix Bug reported by Phil Sabolbora\n+ Add QuickSetting - Auto Rotate
